actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to provide that all Federal Reserve notes printed after January 1, 1977, shall be in such form as to enable any individual who is totally blind to be able to identify the denomination of any such note.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Reserve Act to require that paper money printed after January 1, 1977, shall be in such form to enable blind persons to clearly identify the denomination of such note.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to provide that all Federal Reserve notes printed after January 1, 1977, shall be in such form as to enable any individual who is totally blind to be able to identify the denomination of any such note.
